edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Interface Weapon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IntrinsicWeapon, WeaponItem

    public interface Weapon
    Interface for weapon items. As well as providing methods needed by weapons, this interface is used in Item to determine whether an item can be used as a weapon.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int damage()
      The amount of damage the Weapon will inflict
      java.lang.String verb()
      A verb to use when displaying the results of attacking with this Weapon

    • Method Detail

      • damage

        int damage()
        The amount of damage the Weapon will inflict
        Returns:
        the damage, in hitpoints

      • verb

        java.lang.String verb()
        A verb to use when displaying the results of attacking with this Weapon
        Returns:
        String, e.g. "punches", "zaps"
